OHIMA 2016 – March 7th-9th, 2016
 
The most informative healthcare show, OHIMA Annual Meeting is all set to hit town at the Hilton Columbus at Easton from March 7th to 9th, 2016. Our team is a Bronze Sponsor at the event and will be there at Booth #11, so come on over for a quick chat.
